body:
Hey guys i have a Question About a Rule
If a Mod banned you and hes Got Demoted do you can get Unbanned??

Screenshot  :  http://gyazo.com/4e5cbe5d6fc716c4140f8b22a0b07e92
minecraft name Elandorr

title: how does it work with Ban

replies.body: No, the ban stays in place.
replies.body_tagged: No, the ban stays in place.

replies.body: No it doesn't. Appeal here on the forums
replies.body_tagged: No it doesn't. Appeal here on the forums

replies.body:
I wish it would XDD

But no, you will stay banned ;(
replies.body_tagged:
I wish it would XDD

But no, you will stay banned ;(

replies.body: - Please let a Mod Reply to this
replies.body_tagged: - Please let a Mod Reply to this

replies.body: The community knows the rules just as much as the mods do, that's why were all not banned.
replies.body_tagged: The community knows the rules just as much as the mods do, that's why were all not banned.

reply_to.body: - Please let a Mod Reply to this
reply_to.body_tagged: - Please let a Mod Reply to this

replies.body:
The ban stays in place, regardless of the state of the moderator who banned you. This means even if a demoted mod, or banned mod were to ban you, your punishment would remain valid.

I will lock this, as the thread's question has been answered.
If you need any more helps or have any more questions, don't hesitate to ask me or another staff member!

Midnite
